stateDiagram

StartGame

StartGame : StartGame

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

state DealTwoPlayer {

        Deal2_FirstPlayer

        Deal2_FirstPlayer : Deal2_FirstPlayer

        Deal2_FirstPlayer : enter / #123; _adapter.DealThreeCards()#59; #125;

        Deal2_SecondPlayer

        Deal2_SecondPlayer : Deal2_SecondPlayer

        Deal2_SecondPlayer : enter / #123; _adapter.DealThreeCards()#59; #125;

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as DealTwoPlayer.(InitialState)

        FlipTrump

        FlipTrump : FlipTrump

        FlipTrump : enter / #123; _adapter.FlipCard()#59; #125;

}

state DealFourPlayer {

        Deal4_FirstPlayer

        Deal4_FirstPlayer : Deal4_FirstPlayer

        Deal4_FirstPlayer : enter / #123; _adapter.DealThreeCards()#59; #125;

        Deal4_SecondPlayer

        Deal4_SecondPlayer : Deal4_SecondPlayer

        Deal4_SecondPlayer : enter / #123; _adapter.DealThreeCards()#59; #125;

        Deal4_ThirdPlayer

        Deal4_ThirdPlayer : Deal4_ThirdPlayer

        Deal4_ThirdPlayer : enter / #123; _adapter.DealThreeCards()#59; #125;

        Deal4_FourthPlayer

        Deal4_FourthPlayer : Deal4_FourthPlayer

        Deal4_FourthPlayer : enter / #123; _adapter.DealThreeCards()#59; #125;

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as DealFourPlayer.(InitialState)

}

Add10PointsToDealer

Add10PointsToDealer : Add10PointsToDealer

Add10PointsToDealer : enter / #123; _adapter.Add10PointsToDealer()#59; #125;

state PlayPhase1 {

        Phase1_TrickStart

        Phase1_TrickStart : Phase1_TrickStart

        Phase1_Wait

        Phase1_Wait : Phase1_Wait

        Phase1_Wait : enter / #123; _adapter.AllPlayerPlayed()#59; #125;

        Phase1_Play

        Phase1_Play : Phase1_Play

        Phase1_Play : enter / #123; _adapter.AllPlayerPlayed()#59; #125;

        Phase1_TrickWinner

        Phase1_TrickWinner : Phase1_TrickWinner

        Phase1_TrickWinner : enter / #123; _adapter.DetermineWinner()#59; #125;

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as PlayPhase1.(InitialState)

        Meld

        Meld : Meld

        Meld : enter / #123; _adapter.AddMeldPoint()#59; #125;

        DrawACard

        DrawACard : DrawACard

        DrawACard : enter / #123; _adapter.DrawCardFromDeck()#59; #125;

        Deck

        Deck : Deck

        Deck : enter / #123; _adapter.CheckDeckCardCount()#59; #125;

        state PlayPhase2 {

                Phase2_TrickStart

                Phase2_TrickStart : Phase2_TrickStart

                Phase2_Wait

                Phase2_Wait : Phase2_Wait

                Phase2_Wait : enter / #123; _adapter.AllPlayerPlayed()#59; #125;

                Phase2_Play

                Phase2_Play : Phase2_Play

                Phase2_Play : enter / #123; _adapter.AllPlayerPlayed()#59; #125;

                Phase2_TrickWinner

                Phase2_TrickWinner : Phase2_TrickWinner

                Phase2_TrickWinner : enter / #123; _adapter.DetermineWinner()#59; #125;

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as PlayPhase2.(InitialState)

                Hand

                Hand : Hand

                Hand : enter / #123; _adapter.CheckCardsOnHand()#59; #125;

                RoundEnd

                RoundEnd : RoundEnd

        }

}

GameEnd

GameEnd : GameEnd

StartGame --> DealTwoPlayer : TwoPlayerGame

StartGame --> DealFourPlayer : FourPlayerGame

ROOT.(InitialState) --> StartGame

Deal2_FirstPlayer --> Deal2_SecondPlayer : Complete

Deal2_SecondPlayer --> Deal2_FirstPlayer : DealNotComplete

Deal2_SecondPlayer --> FlipTrump : DealComplete

DealTwoPlayer.(InitialState) --> Deal2_FirstPlayer

FlipTrump --> Add10PointsToDealer : Trump7

FlipTrump --> PlayPhase1 : OtherCard

Deal4_FirstPlayer --> Deal4_SecondPlayer : Complete

Deal4_SecondPlayer --> Deal4_ThirdPlayer : Complete

Deal4_ThirdPlayer --> Deal4_FourthPlayer : Complete

Deal4_FourthPlayer --> Deal4_FirstPlayer : DealNotComplete

Deal4_FourthPlayer --> FlipTrump : DealComplete

DealFourPlayer.(InitialState) --> Deal4_FirstPlayer

Add10PointsToDealer --> PlayPhase1 : Complete

Phase1_TrickStart --> Phase1_Wait : OpponentTurn

Phase1_TrickStart --> Phase1_Play : PlayerTurn

Phase1_Wait --> Phase1_Play : OpponentPlayed

Phase1_Wait --> Phase1_TrickWinner : AllPlayerPlayed

Phase1_Play --> Phase1_Wait : WaitingForOpponent

Phase1_Play --> Phase1_TrickWinner : AllPlayerPlayed

Phase1_TrickWinner --> Meld : MeldOpportunity

Phase1_TrickWinner --> DrawACard : NoMeldOpportunity

PlayPhase1.(InitialState) --> Phase1_TrickStart

Meld --> DrawACard : MeldPointGiven

DrawACard --> DrawACard : MorePlayersToDraw

DrawACard --> Deck : DrawCardToAll

Deck --> PlayPhase2 : DeckEmpty

Deck --> Phase1_TrickStart : AvailableCardsOnDeck

Phase2_TrickStart --> Phase2_Wait : OpponentTurn

Phase2_TrickStart --> Phase2_Play : PlayerTurn

Phase2_Wait --> Phase2_TrickWinner : AllPlayerPlayed

Phase2_Play --> Phase2_TrickWinner : AllPlayerPlayed

Phase2_Play --> Phase2_Wait : WaitingForOpponent

Phase2_TrickWinner --> Hand : do

PlayPhase2.(InitialState) --> Phase2_TrickStart

Hand --> RoundEnd : HandEmpty

Hand --> Phase2_TrickStart : MoreCardsInHand

RoundEnd --> GameEnd : WinningScore

RoundEnd --> StartGame : WinningScoreNotReached
